column4: Hi. I just did a clean install of xubuntu and I'm STILL getting crashes. I have no idea where to look for the source
have u installed all updates?
yes
i had issues with xubuntu as well, i went to lubuntu and like it alot
what kind of issues
every time i opened software manager, it would freeze up untill i rebooted
it seems like everytime i use skype i get caught in some kind of infinite loop freeze
i have problems with video calls on my girlfriends 10.10 ubuntu
what kind?
with skype... can send video, sound works, but cant recieve video @ all
oh it all works fine unti; the whole system crashes. do you think that could be xfce?
no idea, i suppose it could be
I JUST did a clean install today, and I'm running out of CDs... do I have to install lubuntu or can i just completely get rid of/replace xfce with lxde?
if i were u, i would do a fresh install, but i dont know how skype works with lubuntu, i havent tried at all. so i wouldnt do that quite yet
if i were in your shoes, id invest in a cheap flash drive though, i dont know what i would do if i didnt have one for booting linux
I have to use a flash drive and a cd
do u have a different machine to test it on? if that is ur only problem, id hesitate to wipe again
no
I would have to have the exact same computer because it seems as if nobody else has this problem
sorry, i cant find anything on google about people experiencing the same issue
did unity run well? no performance issues?
